name: VOCOO Digital Kitchen Timer with 7.8” Extra Large Display, Magnetic LED, with 3 Brightness, 4 Alarms and 3 Volume Levels, Battery Powered Countdown Count Up Timer for Cooking, Classroom, Home Gym
short_description: Your Classroom & Kitchen Command Center - Take back control of your teaching or cooking time. The extra-large 7.8-inch display with 2.3-inch tall numbers keeps everyone—whether students or your family—informed and on task. With 3 brightness levels, it’s equally clear in a sunlit classroom or a dim kitchen. Set it once to track a quiz, a simmering sauce, or screen time, and replace the questions “How much time is left?” or “Is dinner ready?” with focused, productive time

Library-Quiet & Family-Friendly Alerts - Manage any environment with 4 alert options. Activate Silent Mode for zero noise—just a discreet screen flash—perfect for libraries, exams, or naptime. For active settings, choose from 3 distinct audible alarms & beep with 3 adjustable volume levels to match your classroom or kitchen noise

99-Hour Timer for All-Day Management - Move beyond the kitchen. Count down from 99:59:59 or use count-up as a stopwatch. Perfect for timing a 90-minute exam, tracking a 3-hour meeting, managing a 1-hour workout or your child’s daily screen time. From science experiments to gym intervals, two modes handle any task

Marathon Battery Life & Universal USB-C Charging - Designed for your relentless schedule. Enjoy over 7 days of continuous use on low brightness—enough to power through an entire school week or family routine on a single charge. Need more light? Get over 7 hours on high brightness for demanding tasks. Recharge effortlessly via USB-C (cable and 5V charger included). A clear low-power warning ensures you’re never caught off guard

Versatile, Kid-Proof Placement - Strong silicone-covered magnets hold securely to any fridge, locker, or whiteboard. Use the built-in stand for your desk, or the hanging hole for a pantry or classroom hook. Intuitive, separated buttons make it foolproof for you, your students, or your kids to operate

name: 15.2" Large Digital Wall Clock with Seconds, App & Remote Control, Customizable RGB Colors, Alarms, Stopwatch, Countdown, Timer Clock for Home Gym Living Room Office Garage Decor
short_description: 【Large Led Display】Sized is 15.2*4*1.5inch, featuring 2.7inch large digits and 6 levels of brightness adjustment. Customizable RGB colors let you choose any LED color you like, making it the perfect decorative piece.

【App+Remote Control】Supports both app and remote control options. The app is feature-rich, so you never have to worry about losing the remote. It automatically syncs time via Bluetooth, accurate to the second, making it very convenient.
【Timer Function】It’s also a very professional and easy-to-use timer. You can easily use the stopwatch, countdown timer, and programmable interval timer features.

【Custom Hourly Chime】The clock can announce the time with voice at the hour you choose. You can easily adjust the hourly chime time as needed without any interruptions at other times, making it very user-friendly.

【Alarm Clock】It can store up to 10 alarms. You can use the app to set long-term alarms for specific dates (like anniversaries) and repeat alarms. It offers 3 ringtone options and 6 volume levels to choose from.
【Note】Equipped with a USB power cord of over 95 inches, must be plugged in to use. Not battery powered.

product_description: How to set countdown timer: 1. Hold the SET button until you see DAY number start flashing. 2. Press UP/START or DOWN to adjust that particular number. Hold UP/START or DOWN, the number will change quickly. 4. Keep pressing SET button to set the Hour, Minute and Second until the screen stops flashing. 5. Press the UP/START button to start or pause the counting down. * Press and hold the UP/START and DOWN buttons at the same time to reset to “0”. How to set clock: 1. Hold the CLOCK button until you see the clock number “hour” start flashing. 2.Press UP/START or DOWN to adjust that particular number. 3. Keep hitting CLOCK to set minutes – seconds. * In the CLOCK mode, press the DOWN button to switch between 12 and 24 hours systems. How to set count up timer: 1. When the countdown timer is stopped, press the UP/STRART and DOWN buttons at the same time to clear the setting to 0'00'00'00 2. When the timer is in the state of 0000, press the UP/START key to start counting, press the UP/START button to pause the counting, and it can repeat the pause to start the accumulative counting. 3. Press the UP/STRART and DOWN buttons at the same time to clear to “0”. Package Includes: 1* Digital Day Countdown Timer +1* Bracket +1* User manual + 2* CR2032 batteries (Internal)

short_description: A Real Pomodoro Task Timer. The pomodoro technique is a time management method based on 25-minute stretches of focused work broken by 5 -minute breaks. We have preset 5, 25 minutes for you, you don’t have to set it every time by yourself. Other similar cube timers in the market are not real pomodoro timers as they don’t have preset 5, 25 minutes.

Rotating Productivity Timer Flip Timer. We have preset 5, 25, 10, 30,60 minutes for gra vity sensing mode. You only need to flip the timer to the preset number with facing upwards, and then it will automatically start to countdown. Flip the timer screen facing upwards to stop the timing; Flip the timer screen facing downwards to reset it to zero.
Stopwatch Timer Mode. Simply flip the timer to the side with stopwatch icon facing upwards, it will start to count up. Stopwatch timing range: 00-99 minutes and 59 seconds.

3 Volume Levels: Mute/Vibration/Alarm. In vibration mode, the vibration is noticeable at your desk without disturbing others nearby. Alarm volume: 70-80dB. In mute mode, the screen will flash to remind you which is suitable for using in the library.
